src/lib/components/ActivitySelector.reac.description:
ActivitySelector lets the user select 
the activity from the list of activities given.
Has the option to change the year, 
that triggers the list to change 
out of the scope of this component.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

selectedYear.description: Activities are shown from the current selected year

debugMode.description: Activities are shown from the current selected year

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
